name: Windows Crash Dump File
summary: Learn about .KDMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: KDMP files may be contained within a .CAB file, along with .MDMP, .HDMP, and other files. They can be analyzed using WinDbg, which is part of Microsoft's free "Debugging Tools for Windows" suite.

description: Memory dump saved to a file by Windows; contains a snapshot of the kernel mode portion of a given user mode process; used for debugging applications; may be created on Windows or Windows CE systems.
